name: 5Nights no Obieru Koro ni Season 1
description:
Welcome to the world of a FNaF Doujin Horror Kinetic Visual Novel named "5Nights no Obieru Koro ni".

This is the Season 1 of the game. These 2 games, and other 2 games were released under my old name "Anon Makiz".

Warning! This game contains bad language, graphic violence and pretty loud sounds.

Uploaded files are their NSIS installers.

This game is only in Japanese, but I hope you can translate everything written in there. And I think, someday there'll be an English patch of it.

Made with Ren'PY Visual Novel Engine

Composers which music is in this game:

- Music Material

- nerve (Zatsuon Kuukan)

- Amacha no Ongaku Koubou

- AI-D-IA'S "Ongaku Koubou vol.1"

- Rengoku Teien (my favourite composer)

All character sprites and some backgrounds were made by me.

So, without further ado, enjoy the game!

- Vova M. from VMSoft
